extensionAttribute.displayName: MS OneNote Installed via App Store
extensionAttribute.description: Will return Yes or No Yes= Installed via App Store No= Not Installed via App Store
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac:
#!/bin/zsh
if [[ -e /Applications/Microsoft\ OneNote.app/Contents/_MASReceipt ]]; then echo "<result>Yes</result>"
else echo "<result>No</result>" fi
exit 0
